product_name: Suunto Ambit3 Peak GPS Multifunction Watch
long_description: Whether you set your sights on a new summit or a new personal best time, the Ambit3 Peak is up for the adventure. It provides all the data you need to take your performance to the next level.
short_description: Whether you set your sights on a new summit or a new personal best time, the Ambit3 Peak is up for the adventure. It provides all the data you need to take your performance to the next level.
